generated_text:
- road: The asphalt surface in the foreground and extending into the distance is a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area with cobblestones on the left and right sides of the road, separated by curbs and bollards, is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including the red brick building on the right and the yellow building on the left.
- wall: The red brick wall on the right side of the image is a wall.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the tall metal pole on the left and the poles supporting the traffic sign.
- traffic sign: A blue and white traffic sign indicating a "ZONE" for pedestrians and children is visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalk and in front of some buildings.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background above the buildings.
- person: A person can be seen sitting at an outdoor table on the left side of the image.
